name: overdose
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(informal OD) too much of a drug taken or given at one time, either intentionally or by accident: When he was 17 he took an overdose of sleeping pills and nearly died. Jimi Hendrix died of a drug overdose.UK also a drugs overdose
humorous too much of something: After watching two operas, I was suffering from an overdose of culture.

(informal OD) to take too much of a drug: She overdosed on aspirin and died.
humorous to have too much of something: I think I've just overdosed on cheesecake!
